name: Atlantis (itch) (Objectif 3D)
description:
Pitch : You are fugitive topic of scientific studies who is recovering advanced technology gloves that will give him supernatural powers and help him navigate his way through an underwater military base.

This game is a game made by our students after two years in Objectif 3D, french school (www.objectif3d.com). Follow the list of all the students who made this amazing game possible :
